subject_terms_1:This is a certificate of discharge. The form is printed in black ink. The fields of the certificate is filled in with handwritten inscriptions in black ink. There is a date and signature at the bottom of the form. The form is creased along its horizontal and vertical centre. There are several small holes on the form
 in the middle and along the edges. documents (object genre) discharges
